title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
Product Name: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)

Product Details:

This 4-in-1 outlet adapter is perfect for travelers visiting Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City. It accepts standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs and has a max capacity of 2500 Watts (250 Volts, 10 Amps). The adapter features dual USB ports that can charge up to 2.4 Amps and two American outlets. It has a grounded 3 prong plug and a compact, ultra-light design, measuring only 2.8 inches in length, 2.6 inches in width, and 2.3 inches in height.

This travel adapter is perfect for charging your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other electric products. It's a 100V-250V wide voltage device and supports dual voltage, but please note that it's not a converter. Devices must support 100V-250V Dual Voltage if not for low power electronics.

The adapter is CE and FCC certified, ensuring quality and safety. It comes with a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service. Please make sure your devices support the input voltage range before using this adapter.

Compatible Countries: Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, Vatican City.

Suitable Devices: Cell phone, Tablet, Power Bank, Other electric products.
